trans-unit.source: Defines constants that inform <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren(System.Windows.Forms.ValidationConstraints)" /> about how it should validate a container's child controls.
By default, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A> will validate all enabled controls in a container, such as a form.
trans-unit.target: Standardmäßig <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A> überprüft alle aktivierten Steuerelemente in einem Container, z. B. ein Formular.

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to restrict the types of controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Diese Enumeration verwenden, um die Typen von Steuerelementen zu beschränken, deren <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> Ereignis wird ausgelöst.

trans-unit.source: You can combine these enumerated values together with a bitwise OR operation.
trans-unit.target: Sie können diese aufgelisteten Werte zusammen mit einer bitweisen OR-Operation kombinieren.

trans-unit.source: Combining parameters with a bitwise OR operator will result in a logical AND operation.
trans-unit.target: Kombinieren Parameter mit einem bitweisen OR-Operator führt eine logische AND-Operation.

trans-unit.source: For example, calling `ValidateChildren(ValidationConstraints.ImmediateChildren | ValidationConstraints.Enabled)` will only raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event on controls that are both immediate children of the container AND are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Beispielsweise Aufrufen `ValidateChildren(ValidationConstraints.ImmediateChildren | ValidationConstraints.Enabled)` löst nur die <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> Ereignis auf Steuerelemente, die sowohl das unmittelbar untergeordnete Element des Containers und aktiviert sind.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify ImmediateChildren when you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>, the method will require that you validate all child controls in the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie beim Aufrufen keine ImmediateChildren angeben <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>, die Methode erfordert, dass Sie alle untergeordneten Steuerelemente in der Steuerelementhierarchie überprüfen.

trans-unit.source: The following code example will only cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event to be raised for immediate children of the form whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Im folgenden Codebeispiel wird bewirkt, dass nur die <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> Ereignis für direkt untergeordnete Elemente des Formulars ausgelöst, deren <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> Eigenschaft ist `true`.

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls whose <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
Validates child controls that are directly hosted within the container.
Does not validate any of the children of these children.

For example, if you have a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> that contains a custom <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" />, and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" />, using <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ValidationConstraints.ImmediateChildren" /> will cause the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> to occur, but not the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" />.
Validates all child controls, and all children of these child controls, regardless of their property settings.
Validates child controls that can be selected.
Validates child controls that have a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop" /> value set, which means that the user can navigate to the control using the TAB key.
Validates child controls whose <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
